Hello there! My name is Ricardo Martins and I'm currently in my third year of Computer Science at Faculdade de Ciências e Tecnologia — Universidade Nova de Lisboa.

You can also find me at twitter, identi.ca, del.icio.us, flickr, librarything, last.fm, friendfeed, dopplr, and linkedin.

When I'm not reading, I'm probably writing code. Most can be found at github.

I'm currently developing for the Nintendo DS as a hobby, which I'd like to do full time.

You should probably take a look at my resume if you're interested in hiring me.
